players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Revealing my role now might help the town, but I'll keep it secret for now."
You: "Think carefully before making accusations. We need to gather more information."
Diana: "I will continue to play cautiously, gathering more information. The town needs unity and careful thought before making accusations."
Bob: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. We need solid proof before making any accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
